Container.Name: welle.io-cli
Container.Overview: welle.io is an open source DAB and DAB+ software defined radio (SDR) with support for rtl-sdr (RTL2832U) and airspy.

Config.Name: The RTL2832U or other compatible device
Config.Description: Open a Terminal, type 'lsusb' and hit enter. Search for your device. The path here is supposed to be like this: /dev/bus/usb/[Bus]/[Device] eg.: /dev/bus/usb/001/014
